articles.content: All Chrome users should install the latest browser updateversion 86.0.4240.183 on PC and version 86.0.4240.185 on Androidas soon as possible. The patches stamp out several security bugs, including tw… [+2527 chars]

articles.title: Oculus Delays Shipment of Quest 2 Elite Straps Amid Complaints of Premature Breakage - Road to VR
articles.description: Some customers who ordered and are still waiting for an Elite Strap and Elite Battery Strap for Quest 2 have received an email from Oculus that maintains their shipments will be delayed, as the company is currently investigating user complaints likely surroun…

articles.author: Julia Lee
articles.title: Riot on how League of Legends’ latest character may have gotten a little too real - Polygon
articles.description: Seraphine, League of Legends’ newest champion, has a Twitter account that started off mostly harmless but then took a turn for the weird once the character started voicing anxieties and asking her followers for help.
articles.content: Seraphine, League of Legends newest character, is a glitter bomb of fame and success within the game. But Riot went so far as to create real-life social media accounts for her character, and in those… [+3635 chars]
